Lashing Branches.name: Lashing Branches
Lashing Branches.flavor: Your moves emulate those of a storm-tossed tree, but they have deadly purpose. You can attack more than a single foe with one attack.
Lashing Branches.onHit: 2[W] + highest ability modifier, and you can slide the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Walking Sentinel.name: Walking Sentinel
Walking Sentinel.flavor: You briefly swell in height to the size of a forest ash. You stride through your enemies and rain blows down upon them.
Walking Sentinel.effect: Before the attack, shift 4 squares. You can move through an enemy’s space during the shift.

Root Sense.name: Root Sense
Root Sense.flavor: You gain a better vantage on your foes from your increased height above the field of combat as well as through the tiny rootlets you send into the ground around you.
keywords: Personal   Effect: You ignore penalties for cover (but not superior cover), concealment, and total concealment. You can attack an invisible target as if it wasn’t invisible. This benefit lasts until you successfully deal damage to a creature that enjoys one of the protections noted or until the end of the encounter.
Root Sense.effect: You ignore penalties for cover (but not superior cover), concealment, and total concealment. You can attack an invisible target as if it wasn’t invisible. This benefit lasts until you successfully deal damage to a creature that enjoys one of the protections noted or until the end of the encounter.
